oai_dc:dc.dc:otherSubject: Agricultural products; Bridal customs; Brides; Ceremonies; Childhood; Christians; Churches; Clothing and dresses; Dispersion; Dwellings; Education; Family income; Handicrafts; Interreligious relations; Intervillage relations; Landowners; Mayors; Medical care; Mourning; Neighboring villages; Olive Oil; Palestinian-Jewish relations; Permits; Rural life; Social norms; Ṭurʻān (Palestine); Vaccination; Wedding traditions; Arrest; Betrayal; British Mandate of Palestine, 1922-1948; Crimes against humanity; Dayr Yāsīn Massacre, 1948; Displacement; Expulsion from Palestine; Lebanon; Massacres; Means of transportation; Nostalgia; Passing on memories; Propaganda; Psychological warfare; Return; Rumors; al-Qāwūqjī, Fawzī, 1890-1977, Ariel, 1928-2014; Torture; Village siege; ʻAyn al-Ḥilwah (Palestinian refugee camp: Lebanon); Ṣabrā and Shātīlā Massacre, 1982
oai_dc:dc.dc:biography: The interview was recorded on May 5, 2006 with Zahīdah ‘Abd al-Raḥmān, female, born in Ṭurʻān, Palestine and resides ʻAyn al-Ḥilwah Palestinian Refugee Camp, Lebanon.
oai_dc:dc.dc:biographyAR: سجلت المقابلة مع زهيدة عبد الرحمن في 5 أيار مايو عام 2006، أنثى، ولدت في طرعان، فلسطين وتقيم في مخيم عين الحلوة للاجئين الفلسطينيين، لبنان.
oai_dc:dc.dc:toc: Political dynamics during the British Mandate and Zionist occupation and the expulsion to Lebanon. (@ 28:11)
oai_dc:dc.dc:tocAR: الديناميات السياسية تحت الانتداب البريطاني والاحتلال الصهيوني والطرد إلى لبنان. (@ 28:11)
